hero.title: Ñukanchik Ayllukunapa Ashka Yachaykunata Rikuy
hero.subtitle: Shuk ñan kawsay, ñawpa yachay, ñawpa taytakunapa yachaywan

culture.title: Kawsak Kawsay
culture.description: Ñukanchik kawsay ruraykunata, ñawpa churanakunata, yachaykunata yachay

community.title: Ayllu Kawsay
community.description: Imaynata kawsashkanchik, llankashkanchik, kushikushkanchik Pachamama ukupi

about.title: Ñukanchik Munay
about.description: Ayllukunapa ashka yachaykunata wañuchinata mana munanchik. Ñukanchik willaykunata, ñawpa yachaykunata, kawsaykunata tukuy pachapi rikuchinchik. Ñukanchik sapikunawan kawsanata munanchik, mushuk pachata shuyashpa.

clothing.title: Ñawpa Churana
clothing.description: Sapa churanaka shuk willayta charin. Ñukanchik awakunaka makiwan awashka, ñawpa yachaywan, Pachamama lulunkunawan: urku verde, pacha azul, allpa puka.

language.title: Mama Shimi
language.description: Kichwa shimika mana shukllachu shimi, ñawpa taytakunapa kunka. Paywanmi yachaykunata, willaykunata, Pachamama kawsayta yachachinchik.

values.title: Ayllu Yachay
values.description: Ñukanchik kawsanchik ayni, alli kay, Pachamama ukupi. Ayllu ñukanchik hatun ayllu, maypika tukuykuna yanapanakunchik.

crafts.title: Makiwan Ruray
crafts.description: Ñukanchik makikunaka sumak rurayta ruran: mankakuna, awakuna, shikrakuna. Sapa rurashkaka rurakkpa animuta, ashka yachaykunata charin.

daily.title: Sapa Puncha Kawsay
daily.description: Ñukanchik punchaka atallpapa takiywan, kamcha ashnaywan kallarinchik. Allpata llankanchik, uywakunata rikunchik, aylluwan kushikunchik. Kawsayaka Pachamama pachawan purin.

agriculture.title: Ñawpa Tarpuy
agriculture.description: Allpata tarpunchik ñukanchik abuelos shina, killa pachata, Pachamama willaykunata rikushpa. Sara, papa, kinwa, purutu ñukanchik sumak mikuykuna.

organization.title: Ayllu Tantachiy
organization.description: Ñukanchik ayllu tantachishka. Hatun yuyaykunaka tantanakuypi rurashka, maypika tukuy kunka yupaylla. Pushakkunaka yachaywan, ayllu munaywan akllashka.

events.title: Ayllu Raymikuna
events.description: Tantanakunchik pallay, kasarakuy, bautizo, raymikunapi. Sapa raymiwan ñukanchik tantanakuy sinchiyarin.

inti.name: Inti Raymi
inti.description: Inti raymi, chiri pacha raymi, maypika Taita Intita yupayanchik, pallaykunamanta, tukuy pachawan tantanakushpa.

pawkar.name: Pawkar Raymi
pawkar.description: Sisarikuy raymi, maypika mushuk pachata chaskichik tushuywan, takiywan, wiñay ruraykunawan.

kulla.name: Kulla Raymi
kulla.description: Warmi, killa raymi, warmikunata, Pachamamapa warmi kallpata yupayashpa.

music.title: Taki, Tushuy
music.description: Ñukanchik takina imanakuna - rondador, kena, wankara - takikunata ruran kuyay, llankay, kushikuy willaykunawan. Sapa tushuypa hatun yuyay.

rituals.title: Sumak Ruray
rituals.description: Ñawpa ruraykunata ruranchik Pachamamata yupaychinapak, alli pallaykunata mañanapak, kay pacha, yaya pachawan tantanapak.

stories.title: Shimiyuk Yachachiy
stories.description: Abuelos ñukanchik kawsak yachana wasi. Willaykunawan yachaykunata yachachinchik yupaychay, mana manchay, yachay.

fields.title: Tarpuna Allpa
fields.description: Ñukanchik sumak allpa maypika ñawpa mikuykunata tarpunchik

textiles.title: Makiwan Awashka
textiles.description: Sumak lulun awakunaka ñawpa yachaywan rurashka

q1.question: ¿Ayllu rikuna ushani?
q1.answer: ¡Ari! Ñukanchik yupaylla rikukkuna chaskichik, ñukanchik kawsayta yachayta munakkuna. Rimanakuy shamuy yuyachinapak.

q2.question: ¿Imaynata ayllu yanapana ushani?
q2.answer: Yanapawankiman ñukanchik makiwan rurashkata rantiykiwan, ayllu rikuna programapi, yachana proyectokunapi.

q3.question: ¿Kawsay yachana kukinkunata charinki?
q3.answer: Ari, awana, mankakuna, ñawpa mikuy, kichwa shimi yachana kukinkunata ruranchik. Tapuy.

footer.description: Ñukanchik ayllu ashka yachaykunata wañuchinata mana munanchik
